column4: whats the symbolic link so i can make a quick launch to /home?
i tired putting /home/user in the command part but it wont work
what are you trying to do?
add a home folder icon to desktop
I am reading into this, but I am going to assume you want to open a file manager?
well note that i am using kubuntu, Sorry, for the inconvenient
ok but am I right, are you wanting to do that?
i want the a icon to open up in my home dir.
ok so I am going to guess here, you probably want the command to be "konqueror ~"
well then replace it with dolphin
most tend to be pebkac oriented
that did the trick btw. thanks
